field.name: description
field.value: attached patch just makes .FirstItem and .LastItem in AbstractPage<T> behave the same as in AbstractPage. ArgOOR exceptions occur when using code from trunk...

comment.author: eyal
comment.text:
Hi Matt,
I encountered the same problem. How do I use this patch fix?
thanks
Eyal

comment.author: mattyr
comment.text:
you can apply it using diff/patch software, like the tortoisesvn client. it's so simple though, that you can just do it manually -- open the patch file and the change is pretty readable.
cheers

comment.author: henry
comment.text: It was fixed in the meantime. not sure when.
